Its sturdy plastic body promises long-term durability, while an advanced grip ensures a pain-free writing experience, even through extended use. This pen is ideal for artists, students, professionals, and anyone who appreciates high-quality writing tools. How to Use: 1. Unpack your new Zebra AX5 0.5 Green Pen carefully from its packaging. 2. Store your Zebra AX5 0.5 Green Pen in a cool and dry place avoiding extreme temperatures to ensure the ink doesn't dry out or leak. 2. Always replace the pen cap after use. 3. Short Description: • Shampoo to nourish hair from root to tip • Helps to retain essential moisture • To softens and vitalize your hair • Infused with olive, henna and almond • Enriched with natural extracts • Halal & PVC free Long Description: Dabur Vatika Naturals Nourish And Protect Shampoo With Olive And Henna For Normal Hair nourishes and moisturizes your hair from root to tip. It is formulated with olive, henna and aloe vera to make your hair strong and healthy. Olive add softness and strengthen hair by penetrating the hair shaft and preserving moisture. The shine said to come from olive oil may be due to the oil smoothing the outer cuticle of the hair. Olive oil is great for hair because it contains moisturizing ingredients like squalene and oleic acid. It may also help prevent split ends because it can increase hair elasticity. Aloe vera cleanses the hair shaft efficiently, stripping off extra sebum (oil) and residue from other hair products. But aloe vera doesn't hurt your hair strands while it cleans. Unlike other chemicals in hair products, aloe vera is gentle and preserves the integrity of your hair. Aloe vera promotes healthy hair growth thanks to a special enzyme found in aloe called proteolytic enzymes. These enzymes effectively break down dead skin cells on the scalp that may clog hair follicles. Henna extract (Lawsonia inermis) is used in shampoos and conditioners due to its powerful softening and detangling action. The main purpose of Dabur Vatika Naturals Nourish And Protect Shampoo With Olive And Henna For Normal Hair is to remove dirt and oil from the surface of the hair fibres and the scalp. Henna, with its nutrient-rich properties, can enhance the natural shine of your hair. It may also help in maintaining scalp health and preventing premature greying of hair. The cream also helps tame frizz, providing a smooth and sleek finish to your hair. Dabur Vatika Nourish & Protect Styling Hair Cream combines the benefits of a traditional styling butter with the moisturizing properties of a cream. It not only helps style your hair but also nourishes it. The cream is suitable for a variety of hair types, including relaxed, natural, permed, coarse, color-treated, dry, and damaged hair. Dabur Vatika Nourish & Protect Styling Hair Cream is formulated without harsh ingredients, which can be reassuring for those who are conscious of the products they use on their hair. Overall, this hair cream appears to offer a range of benefits for maintaining healthy, styled hair with the help of natural ingredients. Benefits: • Helps lock in moisture by creating a protective layer on the hair strand • Helps to give you naturally stylish, healthy hair • Reduces frizz & dryness and improves manageability • Makes the hair smoother and shinier • Helps make your hair stronger and more resilient • Helps to protect your hair from environmental damage and heat styling • Helps control frizz, makes the hair more manageable and sleeker • Helps you create different hairstyles • Provides the nourishing benefits to the hair strands • Moisturizes the hair, keeping it soft, strong and conditioned • Helps to prevent knots and keep your style intact throughout the day How To Use: • Direction for use: Dabur Vatika Nourish & Protect Styling Hair Cream can be used as the pre and post-shampooing cream. Honey is good for your hair due to its hydrating, strengthening, antibacterial, and anti-inflammatory properties. It has the ability to hydrate and strengthen the hair, boost shine, soothe the scalp. It also has the emollient and humectant properties that add moisture to the hair follicles. This naturally smooths the hair shaft and restores shine and luster to frizzy, dry, curly, or dull hair. Its natural humectant properties seal in moisture to prevent future moisture loss, too. Yoghurt has active bacterial enzymes that treat dandruff, itchy scalp, and cleanses your scalp well. It also moisturizes your hair and locks the natural oils in, giving a natural shine to your mane. The main purpose of Dabur Vatika Natural Moisture Treatment Shampoo is to remove dirt and oil from the surface of the hair fibers and the scalp. Dabur India Limited is the fourth largest FMCG Company in India. Building on a legacy of quality and experience of over 137 years, Dabur is today India’s most trusted name and the world’s largest ayurvedic and natural health care company with a portfolio of over 250 Herbal/Ayurvedic products. Vatika is the proud members of the Dabur Group, a world-leading ayurvedic and natural products company. Vatika has always prided themselves on manifesting nature's amazing powers in nourishing, rejuvenating and adding vitality to hair. At Vatika, the philosophy is that beauty comes from the heart. Benefits: • Aids in nourishing and bolstering hair • Coats and seals essential moisture into hair • Efficiently assists in removing dirt, debris, and smells like smoking or perspiration • Adds shine and manageability • Makes your hair smooth and silky without weighing it down • Provides nourishment without drying or damaging your hair How To Use: • Brush your hair before bath. It helps to untangle hair for easy removal of oil, sweat, dirt or styling products. • Wet your hair thoroughly with water. Shampoos are only effective when it lathers fully. A thorough rinse with water will help the lathering process. • Spread an adequate amount of Dabur Vatika Natural Moisture Treatment Shampoo For Dry, Frizzy & Coarse Hair on your palms, then spread it evenly through your hair and let it soak. • Work your way to the scalp. Once there is enough lather, massage your scalp with the tip of your fingers. (If washing once is insufficient, wash again.) • Rinse thoroughly. Squeeze and remove excessive lather, before rinsing every strand of hair thoroughly.

Short Description: • Removes dirt and oil from the surface of the hair fibers and the scalp • Helps get rid of dandruff from the first wash • Fortified with herbal ingredients • Enriched with lemon, yoghurt & mint with Vatika nourishing oil • Suitable for dandruff-prone hair with proven anti-dandruff activates • Formulated without any harsh chemicals • PVC free halal formula • For dandruff-free healthy hair! Long Description: Dabur Vatika Naturals Lemon & Yoghurt Dandruff Guard Shampoo is the daily hair care product designed to address dandruff and promote a healthy scalp. The shampoo is formulated to not only combat dandruff but also maintain the natural balance of the scalp. Lemon is mentioned as an ingredient with astringent properties that can help control excess sebum production, which is often associated with dandruff. The inclusion of yogurt in the shampoo is said to help maintain essential moisture balance in the hair and scalp. This can be beneficial for relieving the discomfort of an itchy scalp and preventing infections. Mint is mentioned as an ingredient chosen to soothe the scalp. It can provide a cooling and refreshing sensation to the scalp, which can be soothing for individuals with dandruff-prone hair. The shampoo is gentle on both the scalp and hair. It is said to be free of chemicals and designed to maintain the nutrients necessary for hair growth and overall hair health. Dabur Vatika Naturals Lemon & Yoghurt Dandruff Guard Shampoo is claimed to be fortified with herbal ingredients, suggesting that it relies on natural components for its effectiveness. It is also safe and gentle for regular use. Overall, this shampoo seems to be marketed as a natural and effective solution for those dealing with dandruff and related scalp issues. It combines the properties of lemon, yogurt, and mint to offer dandruff defense and maintain a healthy scalp while being gentle on both the scalp and hair. Benefits: • Helps in reducing dandruff and preventing its recurrence • Effectively cleanse the scalp, removing impurities and product buildup • Helps nourish and strengthen the hair • Contributes to a healthier-looking hair • Helps in managing excess oil on the scalp • Helps reduce scalp itchiness and irritation • Leaves the hair shinier and more manageable after each use • Helps to soothe your irritated scalp • Leaves the hair and scalp refreshed and clean after use • Protects your hair from getting damage and rough for shiny and glorious hair How To Use: • Wet your hair thoroughly before applying shampoo. Use warm water to open the hair cuticle for more thorough cleansing. Squirt a small amount of Dabur Vatika Naturals Lemon & Yoghurt Dandruff Guard Shampoo into the palm of your hand. Mix the shampoo with a little water in your hand before applying so it moves through your hair more evenly. Apply it to your scalp and massage until it lathers. Work the shampoo through your hair but pay the most attention to the scalp. Rinse your hair and scalp thoroughly. Don’t scrub at your scalp with your nails while shampooing or be rough. Hair is more fragile when wet and tangles more easily. Don’t shampoo twice. Only extremely dirty hair would ever need it.

The shampoo contains Vatika oils that deeply nourish hair from root to tip, enhancing its shine and softness. The shampoo emphasizes its natural ingredients, which are believed to contribute to making hair strong, smooth, and less prone to falling out. Overall, this Dabur Vatika Naturals Cactus & Gergir Hair Fall Control Shampoo is marketed as a natural and herbal solution to control hair fall, strengthen hair, and promote healthy and shiny hair. With Vatika's natural shampoo enhanced with cactus and Gergir, it's time to say goodbye to weak hair and hello to your healthy, thick, and shining strands of exquisite strength. Short Description: • Shampoo to repair and revitalize the hair • Removes dirt and oil from the surface of the hair fibers and scalp • Helps to lock in essential moisture into hair strands • Infused with natural extracts • Formulated with Vatika oils and herbal formula • Enriched with honey and egg • For strong revitalized hair • Ideal for damaged, split hair • Formulated without any harsh chemicals • PVC free halal formula Long Description: Dabur Vatika Natural Repair Restore Shampoo is a hair care product enriched with natural extracts of egg and honey, which are known for their beneficial properties for hair. Egg is a rich source of protein, which helps strengthen hair from the roots to the tips. Hair is primarily made of a fibrous protein called keratin, and egg protein can act as a substitute for the loss of keratin in damaged hair. This can fill in the gaps in damaged hair and restore its original strength and suppleness. Honey is known for its emollient and humectant properties. It can add moisture to hair follicles, making hair smoother and more manageable. Honey also imparts shine and luster to frizzy, dry, or dull hair. Its natural humectant properties help seal in moisture, preventing future moisture loss. The shampoo replenishes moisture and repairs damage to the protective outer layer of each hair strand. This can be particularly beneficial for those with damaged hair and split ends. The shampoo claims to reduce hair fall due to hair breakage. By strengthening damaged hair and reducing hair fall, it can help promote the appearance of thicker and healthier hair. When used in combination with the Vatika conditioner, this shampoo can reduce frizz for up to three days. This can make your hair look straighter, smoother, and easier to style. The shampoo is formulated with natural ingredients and Vatika oils, which are known for their nourishing properties. In summary, Dabur Vatika Natural Repair Restore Shampoo is designed to provide a range of benefits for damaged and split hair. It aims to strengthen, moisturize, and reduce frizz, ultimately giving your hair a healthier and more vibrant appearance. Benefits: • Moisturizes hair without making it greasy or limp • Deeply repair your hair from root to tip while revitalizing your hair • Helps remove dirt, debris, and odors, such as smoke or sweat effectively • Makes your hair smooth and silky without weighing it down • Makes your hair feel smoother to the touch • Strengthens hair from its roots, giving it a natural bounce and luster • Eliminates damaged hair and makes it healthier and softer • Restores natural nutrients in the root tips How To Use: • Wet your hair thoroughly before applying shampoo. Use warm water to open the hair cuticle for more thorough cleansing. Squirt a small amount of Dabur Vatika Naturals Almond & Honey Moisture Treatment Shampoo into the palm of your hand. Mix the shampoo with a little water in your hand before applying so it moves through your hair more evenly. Apply it to your scalp and massage until it lathers. Work the shampoo through your hair but pay the most attention to the scalp. Rinse your hair and scalp thoroughly. Don’t scrub at your scalp with your nails while shampooing or be rough. Hair is more fragile when wet and tangles more easily. Don’t shampoo twice. Only extremely dirty hair would ever need it.

Product Description: Unleash your creative prowess or pen down your professional thoughts with the vibrant Zebra AX5 0.5 Green Pen. Sporting a sleek design, the Zebra AX5 is equipped with a fine 0.5 mm tip that delivers smooth and flawless green ink flow for creating precise lines. Its sturdy plastic body promises long-term durability, while an advanced grip ensures a pain-free writing experience, even through extended use. This pen is ideal for artists, students, professionals, and anyone who appreciates high-quality writing tools. How to Use: 1. Unpack your new Zebra AX5 0.5 Green Pen carefully from its packaging. 2. Remove the cap located at the top of the pen. 3. Hold the pen comfortably in your preferred hand. Make sure to grip the pen in a way that the tip is pointing downwards. 4. Apply the pen to paper in a gentle, smooth motion to start writing or drawing. 5. Recap the pen after each use to prevent the ink from drying. Storage Instructions: 1. Store your Zebra AX5 0.5 Green Pen in a cool and dry place avoiding extreme temperatures to ensure the ink doesn't dry out or leak. 2. Always replace the pen cap after use. 3. It's best not to store the pen with the tip facing upwards to avoid ink retreat, which may affect the quality of writing. 4. Keep the pen out of the reach of young children when not in use. Materials: 1. High-quality, durable plastic body 2. Smooth flowing, vibrant green ink 3. Fine metal-clad 0.5 mm tip 4. Comfortable grip material.
